        Source  [http] 
        
          https://ocaml.janestreet.com/ocaml-core/109.41.00/individual/core_kernel-109.41.00.tar.gz

           61ee0b07ab7beddbb7580ff83c5c4319 
        		
        

      
             
            
            

              Edit
              
        https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/tree/master/packages/core_kernel/core_kernel.109.41.00/opam
      
            

      
          
        


        

    
Industrial strength alternative to OCaml's standard library

    
The Core suite of libraries is an industrial strength alternative to
OCaml's standard library that was developed by Jane Street, the
largest industrial user of OCaml.


Core_kernel is the system-independent part of Core.


  


        

    



      


      

        

          
            
             

             Necessary for
             

           
        
 cfstream

      

      >= 1.1.2

        
 core

      

            &
            
      >= 109.41.00
          

      < 109.42.00

        
 lablqt

      

      < 0.3

        
 pa_test

      

      < 109.45.00
